entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow mixed with rain beginning after midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
